title: 怎么可以直接放一个装满箭的发射器？
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content:
怎么可以直接放一个装满箭的发射器？版本1.8
怎么可以直接放一个装满TNT的发射器？版本1.8
就是直接放下发射器，里面已经装满了

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~ ~ 发射器 0 replace {Items:[{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:0},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:1},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:2},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:3},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:4},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:5},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:6},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:7},{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:64b,Slot:8}]}
箭和tnt有什么区别吗，改id不就得了

个人的方法是，现在一个发射器里面放满东西
然后按住Ctrl+鼠标中间复制
这样就可以复制里面的物品了
